alert.note: Alert for Jones (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 24 at 12:54AM CDT until July 24 at 3:00AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 130 AM CDT FOR CENTRAL JO DAVIESS...NORTHWESTERN CARROLL...JACKSON...CENTRAL DUBUQUE AND NORTHEASTERN JONES COUNTIES... At 1254 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Potosi to near Emeline, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Emergency management. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Dubuque, Galena, Asbury, Bellevue, East Dubuque, Peosta, Hanover, Elizabeth, Andrew, Scales Mound, La Motte, Menominee, Rickardsville, Sherrill, Springbrook, Council Hill, St. Donatus, Centralia, Sageville and Bernard. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
